prompts.FullName: Give me the name and surname of the candidate with format Name Surname
prompts.JobTitle: Identify the job title of the candidate? Please provide the job title without sentense.
prompts.avaibility: When is the candidate available to start? Without sentence.
prompts.mobility: Is the candidate mobile? Without sentence.
prompts.seniority: Give the number of years of experience does the candidate have? Without sentence?
prompts.skills: List the skills of the candidate? Without sentence.
prompts.certifications: List the certifications of the candidate? We are looking for only the name of the certification and keep it only if it is releated to the job. Provide the level or certification if possible.
prompts.experiences: List the professional experiences of the candidate in antichronological order. Include description, dates, and company if possible. Also include eventual task descriptions. Include interships and apprenticeships.
prompts.personal_projects: List the personal projects of the candidate related to the job?
prompts.languages: List the languages spoken by candidate. Without sentence. Provide the level or certifications if mentioned.
prompts.education: List the education of the candidate? Without sentence. Add dates, and schools if possible.
prompts.interests: What are the personnal interests of the candidate? It may be sport, music or whatever.
